\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{SDL\_MostSignificantBitIndex32()}{SDL\_MostSignificantBitIndex32()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+F\+O\+R\+C\+E\+\_\+\+I\+N\+L\+I\+NE int S\+D\+L\+\_\+\+Most\+Significant\+Bit\+Index32 (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{Uint32}]{x }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}

Get the index of the most significant bit. Result is undefined when called with 0. This operation can also be stated as \char`\"{}count leading zeroes\char`\"{} and \char`\"{}log base 2\char`\"{}.

\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
Index of the most significant bit, or -\/1 if the value is 0. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
